original_text: Then the soldiers spat into Jesus' face. They took the stick and they hit Jesus on his head with it many times.
korean_text: 그에게 침 뱉고 갈대를 빼앗아 그의 머리를 치더라

sentences.original_text: Then the soldiers spat into Jesus' face.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 군사들이 예수의 얼굴에 침을 뱉었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and they hit Jesus on his head with it
